abstract.text: A numeric quantity labeled with a unit of measure, with support for unit conversion and unit-aware calculations.

An object representing a numeric quantity with a unit of measure, for use when you need reference semantics or other Foundation-specific behavior.
An alias for this value type's equivalent reference type.
An abstract class representing a dimensional unit of measure.

inlineContent.text: object represents a quantity and unit of measure. The
type provides a programmatic interface to converting measurements into different units, as well as calculating the sum or difference between two measurements.
objects are immutable, and cannot be changed after being created.
Measurements support a large set of operators, including
, and a full set of comparison operators.
